chat_history.message: Hello, My iPhone 13 has a problem: Charger cable not included. Thank you,

Hello ecomobile,

I hope you're having a great day!

This is Wilber from Back Market Customer Care

We hope you’re doing well. We’re reaching out to let you know that the cable that your customer Lara ordered is missing.

Please ship a replacement accessory within 48 hours and send us the tracking number. 

If you don’t have the item in stock, or can’t ship it in the next 48 hours, we’ll give them a goodwill gesture of 10 € at your expense as stated in our Quality Charter. 

Please note that the new accessory should be delivered to the customer within 5 business days and that the shipment should be tracked, as per the Quality Charter.

We’ll keep an eye out for your response.

Best regards,
Wilber Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We are sorry to hear that the customer did not receive the charging cable. According to the quality charter we are able to give a commercial gesture of 10 euros for the missing cable so that the customer would be able to purchase one by himself. Do let me know if the customer accepts this gesture. Thank you.

Regards,
CH
